[0551]FIG. 143 shows a schematic perspective view of an illuminated-type switch 231, FIG. 144 shows its perspective disassembled view, and FIG. 145 shows a generally sectional view of the switch, according to a fifty-fifth embodiment. In this illuminated-type switch 231, one light emitter 12 is installed within a recess 233 disposed on an upper wall of a light emission unit 232, and an optical module 72 as shown in FIG. 47 is put to cover the light emitter 12.
